title: Right

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-If someoneâ€™s role is altered to make the statement true, the game will update as if they used the abilities of that role while keeping the same targets
-You may use your ability once while dead. You may not revive yourself this way
-You always spawn with Wrong (1615) and have a night chat with them.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: See the town lose. You may win while dead

desc:
Post 2736
_Can time travel exist?_
Ability:
-At day, choose a statement that was said during the day. The timeline will alter itself so that the statement is true. If the statement was already true, you will be notified. The host has the liberty of choosing how they want to do this
